thread.section_title: Fine Linens Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fine Linens | finelinens.com
thread.title: SCOTT CARTER
thread.title_full: Fine Linens reviewed by SCOTT CARTER

author: SCOTT CARTER
title: SCOTT CARTER
text:
Customer service and attention to detail is superb. I received immediate and personal response from the owner of the company when I contacted them with a "problem". After researching the issue it was mutually determined that it was I who made the mistake! Regardless, they still insisted that they correct and handle it for me!
I do not need to tell you that the quality of their products is superb if you know the lines they carry! I ordered a custom product and it was delivered exactly when they said it would. This is my 10th order from Fine Linens.
